content.text:
# List of Cultural Properties of Japan – archaeological materials (Ehime)

This list is of the Cultural Properties of Japan designated in the category of  for the Prefecture of Ehime.
National Cultural Properties
As of 1 February 2015, one National Treasure has been designated.

| align="center"|Excavated Artefacts from Narabarayama Sutra Mound, Iyo ProvinceIyo no uni Narabarayama kyōzuka shutsudo hin ||  || Imabari || (kept at ) || including a bronze hōtō, a bronze sutra container, five bronze mirrors, five bronze bells, an iron bell, a gong, knives, a hairpin, a copper coin, two porcelain dishes, fragments of a vase, an earthenware bowl, and two folding fans || ||  || [https://kunishitei.bunka.go.jp/heritage/detail/201/854 ]
|-
|}
Prefectural Cultural Properties
As of 10 December 2014, four properties has been designated at a prefectural level.
